I highly recommend checking out #SundayFishSketch on Twitter for some fish-themed art done by people much more talented than me. 


\
\

```{r, echo = F}
library(magrittr)
library(bsplus)
bs_carousel(id = "fish", use_indicators = TRUE) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/reticulatespikefish.jpg", style="height: 500px")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/tophalf.jpg", style="height: 500px")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/clownfish and cardinalfish.jpg", style="height: 500px")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0212181922.jpg", style="height: 500px")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0302191311.jpg", style="height: 500px")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0317191105a.jpg", style="height: 500px")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0422191405.jpg", style="height: 500px")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0801191951.jpg", style="height: 500px")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0801191952.jpg", style="height: 500px")) %>%
  bs_append(content = bs_carousel_image(src = "doodles/0801191954.jpg", style="height: 500px")) 
```
